criterion: Provides information about the recommended antibiotic regimen for treating gonorrhea.
Correctly explains the transmission of gonorrhea.
Asks for clarification on Neisseria gonorrhoeae characteristics.
Uses natural language and is easy to understand.
Does not provide overly complicated or professional medical information.
Fails to mention symptoms of gonorrhea.
Incorrectly states that gonorrhea can be spread through non-sexual contact.
Does not provide information on how to prevent gonorrhea.
Tells the user to seek medical attention without specifying any symptoms or conditions.
Provides an overview of the male and female reproductive systems.
